title: can anyone id this font?
content:
thanks for your help!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font id.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224091355/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20id.jpg) | 38.54 KB |
author: lellis

comments.content: Refreshment Stand from Font Diner is close.

Cocktail Script is the right one, though. Also from Font Diner (County Fair Picnic set).

- Mike Yanega

Here's the [sample from the Script Font ID Guide](http://web.archive.org/web/20130224091355/http:/www.bowfinprintworks.com/ScriptSmall6/Cocktail-Script.gif) (font courtesy of Stuart Sandler).

- Mike Yanega
